data.name: Sharon Carter
data.description: Niece of the legendary Peggy Carter, Sharon Carter uses her covert weapons training to disable the enemy through negative status effects.

starItems.name: Sharon Carter
starItems.description: Niece of the legendary Peggy Carter, Sharon Carter uses her covert weapons training to disable the enemy through negative status effects.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if Captain America (Sam) is an ally, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color> to primary target.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if Captain America (Sam) is an ally, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color> to primary target.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if Captain America (Sam) is an ally, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color> to primary target.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if Captain America (Sam) is an ally, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color> to primary target.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if Captain America (Sam) is an ally, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color> to primary target.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>3</color> turns

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>3</color> turns.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if Captain America (Sam) is an ally, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color> to primary target.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>3</color> turns.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if Captain America (Sam) is an ally, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color> to primary target.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to primary target

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to primary target

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to secondary targets

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to primary target for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>390%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>90%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to secondary targets for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>480%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>330%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>120%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>120%</color> damage to secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to primary target for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>600%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>450%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

1.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects on the primary target + attack for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.
Chain to up to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>40%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.

Gain <color=#86e619>+5,000%</color> Extra Focus against the primary target.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage to secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to primary target

2.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects on the primary target + attack for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
Chain to up to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.

Gain <color=#86e619>+5,000%</color> Extra Focus against the primary target.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to secondary targets

3.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects on the primary target + attack for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
Chain to up to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.

Gain <color=#86e619>+5,000%</color> Extra Focus against the primary target.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to secondary targets

4.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects on the primary target + attack for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
Chain to up to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.

Gain <color=#86e619>+5,000%</color> Extra Focus against the primary target.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to secondary targets

5.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects on the primary target + attack for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
Chain to up to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.

Gain <color=#86e619>+5,000%</color> Extra Focus against the primary target.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to primary target

6.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects on the primary target + attack for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
Chain to up to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.

Gain <color=#86e619>+5,000%</color> Extra Focus against the primary target.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to secondary targets
Clear all positive effects from primary target

7.description:
Clear all positive effects on the primary target + attack for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
Chain to up to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.

Gain <color=#86e619>+5,000%</color> Extra Focus against the primary target.

1.description:
While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>200%</color> Focus.

On self, <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color>, or <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> ally turn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>. In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, this always occurs.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, when an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> health, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color> allies.

2.description:
While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>220%</color> Focus.

On self, <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color>, or <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> ally turn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>. In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, this always occurs.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, when an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> health, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color> allies.
2.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color> allies

3.description:
While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>220%</color> Focus.

On self, <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color>, or <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> ally turn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>. In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, this always occurs.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, when an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> health, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color> allies.
3.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color> allies

4.description:
While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>220%</color> Focus.

On self, <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color>, or <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> ally turn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>. In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, this always occurs.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, when an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> health, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>45%</color> Damage for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color> allies.

5.description:
While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>300%</color> Focus.

On self, <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color>, or <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> ally turn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>. In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, this always occurs.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, when an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> health, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>45%</color> Damage for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color> allies.
